definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013
beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
Hu Jia (1973-), PRC dissident human rights activist
Hu Shi (1891-1962), original proponent of writing in colloquial Chinese 白話文|白话文[bai2 hua4 wen2]

sentences.english: Those college girls went slumming and came home with sex diseases.
sentences.chinese: 那些大学女生跟下流的人“胡”混，带回了性病。

sentences.english: But Hu did not ask anyone.
Hu in March and a half before opening this pear.
sentences.chinese: 胡地三月半，梨花今始开。

sentences.english: Other proof of the plasticity of carrot was also forthcoming.
sentences.chinese: 胡罗卜可塑性的其他证明也垂手可得。

sentences.english: Croquet first played in Hawaii at Punahou School in Honolulu.
sentences.chinese: 槌球首次传入夏威夷火奴鲁鲁的帕纳胡学校。

sentences.english: 'That boosts confidence, ' says Professor Hu, who teaches operations management.
sentences.chinese: 教经营管理的胡教授说，这使人们的信心大增。

sentences.english: "Radioactive iodine will be gone in a month," Hoffman said.
sentences.chinese: “放射性的碘一个月后消失，”胡夫曼说。

sentences.english: Climbers Brian Hall and Jerry "Nikko" Cooke have been on Mount Hood for 12 days.
sentences.chinese: 布赖恩豪尔和杰瑞尼克库克在胡德山中已经12天了。

sentences.english: So that’s why Hu loved going to the temple.
sentences.chinese: 这是胡很喜欢去寺院的原因。

sentences.english: Report to Assistant Regimental Commander Hu.
He wants Mr. Hu to give Jim some work to do during the holiday.
sentences.chinese: 他希望胡老师能在假期给吉姆布置一些作业做。

sentences.english: She put carrots in the stew.
sentences.chinese: 她把胡罗卜放入炖汤里。

sentences.english: Most people do not know that carrots can be grown during the winter months.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的人都不知道胡罗卜在冬天也可以种植。

sentences.english: Rescue crews gave up any hope today of finding alive the remaining2climbers missing on mount hood.
sentences.chinese: 救援人员今天放弃了胡德山两名失踪者幸存的希望。

sentences.english: Hu Xuebing is on his way to the county town. He needs to sell his tofu at the morning market.
sentences.chinese: 胡学兵正赶往县城，他要在早市上卖掉今天的豆腐。

sentences.english: He shaved off his beard but kept his moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他刮了下巴上的络腮胡子，但仍留着嘴边的胡髭。

definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
